title: Definitions
context: §26H-3 Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of commerce and consumer affairs. &ldquo;Repeal date&rdquo; means the effective date of repeal established for various chapters by section 26H-4. [L 1977, c 70, pt of §2; am L 1979, c 121, §1; am L 1982, c 204, §8; am L 1983, c 124, §17] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted.
